annotations.description: The Piña Verde was created by Erick Castro of Polite Provisions in San Diego. I don't have a date fro this one. The idea came from Castro's penchant of addin...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Piña Verde

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Green Chartreuse
1.5oz (45ml) Pineapple Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) House Made Coconut Cream
.5oz (15ml) Lime Juice
Mint Sprig Garnish

Blend ingredients with ice in blender
Garnish with mint

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pfDDnN5kKlw
title: Pina Verda
